==== 0.js (2 errors) ====

    /**
     * @param {number=} n
     * @param {string} [s]

    function foo(n, s) {}

!!! error TS2554: Expected 2 arguments, but got 0.
!!! related TS6210 0.js:6:14: An argument for 'n' was not provided.

    ~~~
!!! error TS2554: Expected 2 arguments, but got 1.
